channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I’m a refugee-turned-entrepreneur and Oxford professor. Here’s what we can all learn from the immigrant entrepreneurs who make America great
item.description: Certain principles commonly applied by immigrant entrepreneurs help explain their success—and can be borrowed.

item.title: China’s economic miracle appears to be over, and the future is looking bleak
H-1B visa debates roil U.S.-India relations ahead of Trump-Modi meeting. Here’s what needs to change—on both sides
item.description: Can "Made in the USA" and "Make in India" coexist? Protectionist policies from each side are hindering progress.

item.title: Stablecoin donation company Coala Pay closes $3.5 million funding round
item.description: Coala Pay connects donors with local aid organizations using smart contracts and stablecoins.

item.title: Native-born Americans didn’t lose jobs in 2024, as claimed. They gained them.
Personalized vaccine offers hope for patients with late-stage kidney cancer, clinical trial shows
item.description: Researchers, in a sense, manipulated each patient’s cancer in an attempt to prevent it from coming back.

item.title: U.S. consumer sentiment has dropped sharply this month
U.S. at ‘full employment’ as book closes on Biden-era job market — live updates
Stock declines deepen as Trump reportedly tells allies of reciprocal-tariff plan
Is the market rooting for Kansas City? History shows stocks gain 21% when Chiefs play in the Super Bowl
item.description: With a massive disclaimer that these coincidences are probably not the basis of sound investment advice, here are some fun facts for your Super Bowl p...
